body.name: MICHELANGELO 10 Inch Frying Pan with Lid, Nonstick Frying Pan with Healthy Granite Coating, Nonstick Pan with Anti-Scald Handle, Induction Compatible
features: Ultra Nonstick & Scratch Resistant Interior - The 10 inch frying pan nonstick interior is made of aluminum, which is more durable, sturdy, and scratch resistant. Food slides right off the truly nonstick surface for optimum cooking. Super easy to clean up.

Eco-friendly Non-Stick Granite Coating & Easy to Clean - Natural Stone material is ideal for healthy cooking. Choose Michelangelo Stone Frying Pan with lid for greener and safer cooking 100% APEO & PFOA-Free.

Heats Quickly & Evenly - The nonstick frying pan with durable 3 layers bottom provides better performance of even heat distribution and warp-resistance, releasing foods effortlessly. You can also use it to cook a single egg, omelet, sausages, seafood, poultry, burgers or vegetables.

Ergonomic Bakelite Handle - The10 inch frying pan has heat resistant bakelite handle which is suitable for grasping and staying cool while cooking. Suitable handle lengths and curved radians are able to help you master your cooking.
Suitable for All Stoves – The nonstick frying pan is suitable for induction, gas, glass, ceramic and electric. Heat evenly and quickly.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Michelangelo Galaxy Black Nonstick Frying Pan

Stone infused coating for better nonstick. Stone Frying Pan with Lid for Everyday Cooking Making them ideal for preparing eggs , omelettes, vegetables, and sauces. Designed to daily use and offer fast and consistent heating. Comes with glass lid for easy viewing. GRANITE COATING The nonstick frying pan infused with stone effortless food release and lightweight for an easy and comfortable cooking. EASY TO CLEAN Provided with the non-stick ceramic coating, this frying skillet is easy to clean. For washing, you would just need to wipe the surface with a cloth. HEATS QUICKLY & EVENLY Durable 3 layers bottom of this frying pan with lid provides enhanced performance of even heat distribution and warp-resistance Michelangelo Kitchenware Originated in Haan Germany since 1931, Michelangelo is proudly celerbrating its 90 years anniversary and carry on its mission to bring German-Standard kitchen products to every family in the world.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lo e this pan
reviews.reviewText: I am almost 75 years old and picking up an 8 lb frying pan is almost.impossible This pan is.light weight and the surface is perfect, food slides off and cleans really easy. Love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars BY FAR THE BEST!!!
reviews.reviewText: I've had A LOT of cookware over the years... This 8" MICHELANGELO is BY FAR THE BEST i've ever owned... no stick... sturdy... easy to clean... food cooks evenly... and the heat is controllable... AND the lid doesn't warp in the heat. SO GOOD!!! When it's time to retire my other pans I know what I'll replace them with.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is one terrific pan!
reviews.reviewText: This is a really beatifully designed and made pan — the no-stick surface is a wonder! Nothing sticks to it, not even water! Cooks great and keeping foods from burning is easy. The handles stay cool, which is a nice feature, and the domed glass top is another. For this price, this is a sure bet. Nice work, Michelangelo!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not the prettiest pan, but it works very well
reviews.reviewText: Most of my cookware is stainless steel or cast iron, but I like to have one small, non-stick pan, and my old one was scratched and needed to be replaced. I looked for a pan that was not Teflon that had some thickness and looked like it might last. I also wanted a pan that was guaranteed food safe.This pan is thick and sturdy, and it heats evenly. It is raised very slightly from the outside towards the center, which has both pros and cons, but the raised middle is so slight that it is barely noticeable, and I would not hesitate to cook an omellete in it. It does let the grease drain towards the outside of the pan rather than staying under the food, which it nice. I like the glass cover that lets me see food as it cooks, and it is about as easy to clean as any other glass lid.One caution: the directions say to never use the pan above medium heat, and I have been careful not to do that. Even on medium, the pan heats quickly and gets hot enough, and I have found that at medium temperature the pan cooks very evenly without burning or scorching. However, my gas stove does not have a really high flame or get as hot as some other gas stoves even on the burner with the highest btu, and people with stoves that get really hot will need to be very careful and might need to use low heat rather than medium to avoid damage to the pan. It will depend upon individual stoves. So far, nothing sticks, although I have not tried really sticky cheese yet. It cleans up very nicely with soap and water, and I have not had to scrub it. Time will tell whether or not that lasts.The handle is wood look-alike, and it stays cool when cooking on a stove top. It is very wide - especially where it joins the pan - which makes the pan steadier to hold and pour with less strain on my hand and wrist and without slipping or over-tipping.The only reason for 4 stars is that I personally find this pan kind of ugly because of the speckling and the light-colored wood look-alike handle. That is just my personal taste, and it isn't a serving dish.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Terrific non-stick pan!
reviews.reviewText: I had purchased one of these non-stick pans at the same time my husband purchased a different brand non-stick pan. Me - no trouble whatever I cooked and clean-up was a breeze! My husband's - not so good. I ended up buying him one of these for his use!...pancake and easy-over eggs and things that you "flip" - because the food actually flips and doesn't stick! I would highly recommend this. I do not put mine in the dishwasher because I don't want the detergent affecting the wooden handle finish. Actually, no need to put it in there anyway because the clean up is easy - wipe out!! Once in a while I do use some dish detergent to give it a fresh clean, then season it a little like you would an iron skillet. After two years, it still looks new!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Looking for a sturdy but lightweight frying pan? Here you go-nice easy feel and a bit handier than my adorable little 8 inch one-very happy with it and the wooden handle on pan and lid are wonderful as you don’t constantly get burned and need oven mitts to handle! Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is an excellant frying pan,for the price. The construction is far superior to those cheap granite stone. The pan is heavier than those other pans so does not warp when heated up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It seems to clean itself!
reviews.reviewText: It's amazing how easily food slides off this pan. I had to remind myself to clean it when I was done because it looked like it didn't need it.Do not get this for college kids. It will fool them into being lazy slobs!
Small pan used to cook side dishes and eggs for breakfast! Easy to clean and very nonstick

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: This pan has a quality look and feel.
reviews.reviewText: These are my impressions after a few days usage of this nice looking pan. I found it to be a nicely balanced pan in terms of weight and handling. The handle seems solid and should give good service. I like that it has a lid though I have not used it yet. It's non-stick surface does not have the nasties that some non-stick pans have and I have been very happy with its performance. I have found it very easy to clean. Overall, after a few uses, I am very pleased with my purchase and hope it stands the test of time.

reviews.reviewTitle: Mit der Pfanne hat man viel Freude
reviews.reviewText: Die Pfanne benutzen wir fast täglich. In ihr ist bisher jedes Gericht gelungen. Egal ob Spiegeleier, Bratkartoffeln, Schnitzel oder Tortilla. Es brennt nichts an. Der Deckel ist aus Glas, sodass man nach dem Essen gucken kann, ohne den Deckel jedes Mal abzunehmen. Die Reinigung ist sehr leicht. Es reicht aus, die Pfanne mit einem Küchentuch auszuwischen. Noch dazu sieht das Küchenutensil auch noch sehr gut aus.
Very good pan in size and quality. Thanx

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the Netherlands on November 25, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Great quality pan, but the packaging was inadequate and it arrived slightly dented, so the lid would not fit well.
